channel.title: Help me use scar please!
channel.description:
hello my names alex and i am new to scripting. I have been wondering how to use scripts on RS2 accounts so that they can auto for me. if any one can help me and i mean ANY ONE please leave your post here or better yet contact me at super_gigalo@hotmail.com
tyvm!

item.title: Help me use scar please!
item.dc:creator: @hell_warrior hell warrior
item.description:
@hell_warrior wrote:

mmkay sorry -.-
but yeh
im having trouble starting the script it says

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL.scar does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Skill/Woodcutting.scar does not exist.
Failed when compiling

and i dont know what the prouble might
so can you help me out?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me use scar please!
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

ok well ill help you. just tell me exactly you are having trouble with. and plz hurry cuz i g2g to bed soon. leaving for vacation tomorrow![br][size=1]Posted at: July 15, 2006, 08:08:01 PM[/size][hr]ok well since you havent posted what exactly what your having trouble with >HERE< is a a tutorial that should get you started

o yeah and one more thing. we here at moparisthebest like for people to use the search button so there will not be pointless threads of new people asking the same question over and over again that some1 has already answered. or if you simply cannot find what you need use the search button because most likely it has already been asked and answered. just giving you some advice so you will not get flammed at if you create an already asked topic

Read full topic
